attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please sign this petition if you would like to cancel the 2012 Olympics in the UK, and spend the rather extravagant £9.3bn on worthy causes.
Its disgusting,what is the world coming to????£9.3bn spent on the Olympics, when there are adults and children dying all around the world because they have no food, no medicines... What kind of country do we live in? I say ditch the Olympics and spend the money on 'helping people'. Are you with me?Are you really that bothered about watching sport when there are people dying?
